content:
Applivery, a Madrid-based SaaS platform specializing in unified management of corporate Android and iPhone devices, has secured €1 million in seed funding. This investment, led by Pedro Tortosa (Peak Thomas) and Lead Angels by Intelectium, will enable the company to strengthen its presence in the Spanish market, expand its commercial team, and enhance its cybersecurity capabilities. The company aims to position itself as a leading device management platform in Europe by offering scalable, cloud-based solutions to businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises. 

This milestone highlights the increasing importance of secure and efficient device management for businesses, emphasizing Applivery's potential to drive operational efficiency and safeguard sensitive data in a digitally interconnected world. Business leaders should see the company's focus on scalability and marketing acumen as critical factors in its ability to compete globally.
